errors.error_description: The README recommends using `demo.snmplabs.com` for testing but omits the critical warning that the site is defunct and no longer available.
correction_candidates: Add a warning stating that `demo.snmplabs.com` is no longer active.
Replace `demo.snmplabs.com` with a currently active public SNMP agent.
Add a note that the user must host their own SNMP agent for testing.
errors.golden_answer: Add a warning stating that `demo.snmplabs.com` is no longer active.
